kakinada muhammad ali jauhar presidential speech suggested divide untouchables used common name scheduled castes present time among hindus muslim missionaries hindu muslim capitalist classes eager support suggestion would deepen class division manner called friends untouchables attempting divide basis religion time topic highly debated bhagat singh wrote article question untouchables article estimated power limitations working classes suggested concrete progressive development country really bad shape strangest questions asked foremost concerns untouchables count crores population crores instance would contact untouchable mean defilement upper caste would gods temples get angry entry untouchables would drinking water well get polluted untouchables drew water well questions asked particularly maltreated whites moral right voice protest sindhi muslim gentleman mr nur mohd member bombay legislative council aptly remarked hindu society refuses allow human beings fellow creatures title: difference socdem demsoc
text: ive noticed lot people dont really know difference democratic socialism demsoc social democracy socdem thought id clear bit even though seem similar surface goals approaches pretty different social democrats social democrats basically want humanize capitalism reforming push mixed economy government plays big role regulating market providing social welfare programs like healthcare education key thing dont want overthrow capitalism instead believe reforming make fairer theyre creating welfare state still operating within capitalist system short social democrats want keep capitalism make bit nicer democratic socialists democratic socialists hand anticapitalist want replace capitalism socialism build welfare state top people get wrong think want bigger welfare state like social democrats thats goal create socialist society workers state control means production wealth distributed equally also lot us demsocs included open idea revolution theres overwhelming popular support recognize reforms help short term theyre often temporary fixes dont get root problem capitalism key difference believe revolution happen people really behind otherwise risk things like totalitarianism counterrevolution taking thats educating people building support important us cant force lasting revolution without people board saw lot comments sister subs people strawmaning demsocs believe wanted clear things bit said think important us work together towards better future instead getting caught terminology purity tests
text_combined: difference socdem demsoc ive noticed lot people dont really know difference democratic socialism demsoc social democracy socdem thought id clear bit even though seem similar surface goals approaches pretty different social democrats social democrats basically want humanize capitalism reforming push mixed economy government plays big role regulating market providing social welfare programs like healthcare education key thing dont want overthrow capitalism instead believe reforming make fairer theyre creating welfare state still operating within capitalist system short social democrats want keep capitalism make bit nicer democratic socialists democratic socialists hand anticapitalist want replace capitalism socialism build welfare state top people get wrong think want bigger welfare state like social democrats thats goal create socialist society workers state control means production wealth distributed equally also lot us demsocs included open idea revolution theres overwhelming popular support recognize reforms help short term theyre often temporary fixes dont get root problem capitalism key difference believe revolution happen people really behind otherwise risk things like totalitarianism counterrevolution taking thats educating people building support important us cant force lasting revolution without people board saw lot comments sister subs people strawmaning demsocs believe wanted clear things bit said think important us work together towards better future instead getting caught terminology purity tests

things like f would kill people like middle east chickens kfc etc wanted give perspective problematic views whether intentional unintentional first lets talk problematic framing question lgbtq leftist support causes middle east despite regions poor track record lgbtq womens rights framing suggests middle east monolith places social political economic conditions isnt true example palestine colonial occupation saudi arabia longstanding ally western imperial core lgbtq womens rights differ country country instance homosexuality access genderaffirming care legal jordan contrast iran punishes homosexuality death yet also recognizes trans people provides access genderaffirming care lot countries misogynistic antilgbtq explicit itlike countries criminalize homosexualitywhile others use subtle methods pricing women reproductive care denying maternity leave india even within capitalist framework behind issues mean india deserves colonized genocided true liberation women lgbtq folks marginalized group come dismantling systems oppression capitalism patriarchy colonialism imperialism doesnt excuse middle eastern countries criticism also shouldnt grounds selective solidarity western nations like brand protectors human rights allies women lgbtq community reality cover inhumane atrocities indigenous people global south countless human rights violations known pinkwashing heres list atrocities usa alone committed killing oppressing thousands peopleincluding women lgbtq folks native american genocide occupation indigenous lands million deaths slavery transatlantic slave trade million victims least million deaths invasion vietnam million civilian deaths post actions million civilian deaths millions displaced coups coups coupsdirectly infringing sovereignty nations dared even remotely leftleaning ongoing palestinian genocide attacks lebanon estimated deaths many displaced beyond us committed infinite human rights violations continues also worth mentioning slavery upon incarceration still legal us empires crimes oppressed groups abhorrent make physically sick one worst examples tuskegee syphilis experiment hundreds black men syphilis intentionally left untreated without consent experiment also lets forget imperialist atrocities dont benefit middle eastern women lgbtq folksthey harm drones bombs dont land cishet men would still fucked land women lgbtq people children cia also notorious overthrowing governments launching coups targeting countries leaned towards leftism progressive movements middle east sabotaged cia well examples include popular front liberation palestine secular palestinian marxistleninist revolutionary socialist organization abd alkarim qasim somewhat leftleaning leader nationalized iraqs oil industry opposed imperialism enacted womens legal rights education reforms also important consider branding colonial imperialist endeavors liberty equality human rights caused rampant homophobia misogyny many places palestinian teenager loses half family bomb dropped biden obama hear preaching protecting human rights lgbtq womens rights propagates homophobia misogyny idf pig wearing star david commits heinous acts propagating antisemitism lastly leftist dont believe conditional solidaritywhether people support like identity

babasaheb well socialist savarna communists hate hear unfortunately hope everyone liked learned post

hiranyakashapu born lineage brahmin sage kashyapa mentioned person good physique great strength fairskinned great worshipper lord vishnu meanwhile lets look onam festival earliest mention onam sangam age texts festival dedicated mayon vishnu next mention onam comes centuries later text thcentury alvar mystic saint nammalvar also mentions one measured three worlds vamana avatar vishnu thcentury works like pathikas pallads poet periyazharwar describes onam celebrations offerings vishnu mentions feasts community events coming little west back kerala thcentury inscription thrikkakara temple dedicated vamana avatar vishnu mentions series offerings made votary two days prior thiru onam also thcentury inscription tiruvalla temple one largest hindu temples kerala dedicated vishnu mentions onam states donation made temple onam festival offering apart also mentions travellers parts india foreigners onam celebrated kerala along refenrrce original puranic tale surrounding everything began changing avarnadalit castes like ezhavas began attaining power slowly later end british colonial rule first change onam made name poem called onapattu today touted indispensible festival onam reality onapattu political poem written ezhava radical atheist called sahodaran ayyappan part social revolution kerala renaissance period early th century poem written sahodaran ayyapan painted mahabali lower caste ruler eliminated subjugated brahmin vamana one first cases major historical revisionism avarnas kerala however time establishment democratic government kerala state machinery took onapattu sahodaran ayyappan sanitized palatable version potrayed mahabali egalitarian king whose rule kerala golden era everyone equal however since last years increasing attempt atheist bahujan radicals kerala paint mahabali fantasies using appease avarna majority kerala images blackened mahabali internet might seen last years result planning execution maybe due lack history avarnas touting mahabali king subjugated hindus proven nothing could farther truth hindus dont resist forces soon help large united population social media people steal history achievements culture etcand alter one one title: truth hindu majority kerala
text: first acknowledge fact hindus monolithic people especially contemporary hindus furthermore idea kerala predominantly hindu untrue census percentage hindus recorded large number atheists atheism grown significantly last several years due variety reasons including social media subversion central governments alleged attacks secular values rise identity politics american globalist influence etc currently keralites malayalis actually hindus remaining registered hindu population primarily made atheists open closeted ones others cryptopentacosts mainly south kerala may asking kerala turned way must examine keralas past order know exploitation lower castes also known avarnas ie without caste gave rise communism abhrahamic religions kerala savarna hindus seldom thought avarnas fellow hindus worshipped spirits aborginal dieties rather known hindu gods ezhavas numerous caste among avarnas dalits continue prevalent caste kerala savarna hindus like namboothiris nairs ambalavasis etc mistreated ezhavas savarna landlords creating oppressive systems like adhyaratri avakasham pushed ezhava women prostitution many attempted convert christianity islam attempt avoid cruel treatment north kerala preexisting christian influence population less islam became first choice ezhava converts became overpopulated ezhavas malabar hence rare find naturally occurring hindu christian ezhavas nonetheless islam regarded lowest religion central southern kerala ezhavas forced become christians theee nevertheless ezhavas entirely welcomed nasrani christians behaved like upper castes order obtain numerous fundamental rights certain religious rights ability enter temples eventually repeatedly conduct protests reformists various ideologies notably sri narayana guru ezhava social reformer well family civilized ezhavas made part hindu community atleast superficial level efforts narayana guru united ezhavas single cohesive caste enough disrupt status quo thats found refuge communist party played role various anticaste agitation led numerically larger ezhavas avarnas start supporting communism eventually bringing rule indian independence land reforms communist government allocated majority namboothiri nair feudal holdings sizable ezhava votebank token appreciation helping attain political power many ezhava people guaranteed fanatical commitment communism due communists election power today largely result communitys thinking lets review key ideas look original hindu population makes total majority practicing hindus nairs along members upper castes also ezhavas long hostility nairs ezhavas earlier rivalry masterslave relationship existed old times following kerala renaissance period communities developed rivals comparable financial status eliminated possibilities physical violence communities something lose stake however exchange also brought rise psychological warfare included intentional exclusion historical information demoralisation propaganda pieces slander women etc despite keralas outward appearance noncommunalism caste still plays significant role society still heaps passive resentment ostensibly keep exploding online different social media platforms keralites still continue identify caste identities hindu identity many consider relatively new

text: hindutva ideology seeking establish hindu way life across nation seen varying degrees success across india made significant inroads many northern western states impact southern states kerala tamil nadu close nil despite years defeats defeats one bothered look reasons whether common political analysts online right wingers even party leadership generally dealing public hindutvavadis use history evoke sense glorious past hindu kings nation time riling many people memories islamic conflicts since continuity events partition mumbai taj attacks major yet recent ones indian mainland remembers however kerala tamil nadu far removed events much members bore ancestral trauma events appeal islamic invasion history doesnt much impact strategy appeal glorious past hindu kings fails kerala tn two different reasons tamil nadu fails large amount populace consider tamil kings hindus treat saivam shaivism separate religious indigenous tamil nadu treating hinduism later construct kerala population hates monarchy system people identify basis caste rather hindu identity avarna dalit castes forming majority kerala kings upper castes like nairs varmas etc people refuse put aside caste differences common religion maybe avarnas considered hindus since last century caste identity oppression avarnas existence way longer period coming back main topic hindutva succeed places hindutva think tanks simplistic unsophisticated stale thought process regurgitate dialogues tropes every time every place go fail refuse demographic analysis votebank seek conquer demographic analysis doesnt include religion caste caste jati much bigger line divide south various parties various communities main votebank kerala avarna castes like ezhavas pulayas backbone communist party upper caste votes despite already less split among nda udf congress led alliance christian populace also less voting udf slight contenment muslim appeasement kerala bjp tries win avarna votes using hindumuslim boogeyman despite daylight fact avarna castes like ezhavas muslims good bond politically otherwise however recent elections bjp thrissur district focused christians upper castes went succesfully open account state kerala time demographics issue way bjp ever rule kerala whole especially atheists ambedkarites communists islamists remind avarnas constantly lives ancestors lead tamils even harder nut crack despite divided caste demographics little difference among tamils externally tamils also unique behaviour uniting together rock solid manner whenever presence outsider detected moreover considerable amount tamils especially nadarsshanars southern tamil nadu protestant christians evangelical nature bjp tamil nadu tried allying popular regional parties like aiadmk much avail certainly help tamil nadu casteist postmedieval past reactions brahmanical dominance coming form dravidian movement led militant atheists like periyar created practice standing ideals hindutva overall would say right wingers manage due diligence caste demographics states begin play cards accordingly atleast voteshare increased manifold though unlikely form majority rule
